ygData.subject: Re: First moves
ygData.msgSnippet: Burrock started to laugh in the same way that he did earlier. Burrock: Fly? Why fly when the earth is the fastest place for me? Besides, unless a lizard can

Burrock started to laugh in the same way that he did earlier.

Burrock: Fly? Why fly when the earth is the fastest place for me? 
Besides, unless a lizard can grow wings, I don't think you can fly. 
Watch. BEAST MODE!

The worm then burrowed underground and reappeared about 300 meters 
farther just 6 or seven seconds later.

Burrock: Is that all you wanted to see, Scaly?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Shadow Star stared at him indifferently measuring him
> up.
> 
> Shadow Star:  Can you fly or will I have to carry you?
>  I'm not sacrificing speed on the ground.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure"
> > <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > As his second in command approached, Tyrael walked
> > to meet him up.
> > > 
> > > Tyrael: We need to find out if we are at the right
> > place. This means 
> > > that if the scans I asked are positive, we will
> > raid one of the 
> > base. 
> > > Our objective here is not to eradicate our enemy,
> > only to pinpoint 
> > > their position, if they are truly here. However,
> > if I am right, 
> > there 
> > > should be two bases. We will divide our group and
> > raid both bases at 
> > > the same time.
> > 
> > Burrock arrived soon enough. He took no time to
> > transform to robot 
> > mode. His right arm consisted of the flailing
> > tendrils that had ripped 
> > the pod in two. His left arm was normal looking. He
> > stood only 8 feet 
> > up, but his strength was undeniable. What was more
> > disturbing was the 
> > absence of eyes or optics sensors. The bot was
> > blind.
> > 
> > Burrock: You Tyrael? Who's that guy?
> > 
> > Tyrael: Yes, I am Major Tyrael (he insisted on  the
> > Major). This is 
> > Lieutenant Shadow Star, second in command of this
> > group. We are the 
> > Tripredacus Strikers, and our mission here is to
> > find and neutralize 
> > Megatron. We were about to mount a raid. I think you
> > will function 
> > well with Shadow Star.
> > 
> > Burrock: Yeah, whatever. So, SS, whaddaya have to
> > say about me going 
> > with your team?
> > 
> > 
> 
>
